spots.name: Grab
spots.description: The most reliable ride-hailing app in Thailand. Download the app, add your card or pay cash. Prices are fixed and shown upfront. Airport to Old City: around 150-200 THB.
spots.address: Download on App Store or Google Play

spots.name: Bolt
spots.description: Alternative to Grab, often 10-20% cheaper! Same concept - book via app, pay by card or cash. Good for short trips around the city. Sometimes has promo codes for new users.
spots.address: Download on App Store or Google Play

spots.name: Red Songthaew
spots.description: Iconic red pickup trucks that work as shared taxis. Flag one down, tell them where you're going, negotiate price (usually 30-50 THB within Old City). Fun local experience!
spots.address: Flag down anywhere on main roads
